resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
trxcllnt opened a new pull request #12771:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12771


   Fixes an oversight in the v7.0.0 big refactor -- now methods added to the Table's prototype aren't called within the context of the visitor, so `getByteLength()` was throwing a null reference error.
   
   Related JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15852


--
